# **PRIVACY POLICY**

**Sunbrix**  
  
**1\. INTRODUCTION**

This Privacy Policy (“Policy”) applies to the use of the website [https://sunbrix.co/](https://sunbrix.co/), and any related webpages, applications, digital interfaces, landing pages, or communication channels owned or operated by us, operating under the brand name **Sunbrix** (“Company”, “We”, “Us”, “Our”).

By accessing or using the Platform, or by voluntarily providing any information, **You confirm that You have the legal capacity to enter into a contract as defined under the Indian Contract Act, 1872, and You hereby expressly consent to the collection, use, processing, storage, sharing and disclosure of Your Information as outlined in this Privacy Policy.**

This Privacy Policy is incorporated into and governed by our **Terms of Use**. Capitalised terms used but not defined herein shall have the meaning assigned to them in the Terms of Use.

This Policy is published in compliance with:

-   Section 43A of the **Information Technology Act, 2000**
    
-   Regulation 4 of the **Information Technology (Reasonable Security Practices and Procedures and Sensitive Personal Data or Information) Rules, 2011** (“SPDI Rules”)
    
-   Rule 3(1) of the **Information Technology (Intermediary Guidelines and Digital Media Ethics Code) Rules, 2021**
    
-   Principles of the **Digital Personal Data Protection Act, 2023** (when enforced)
    

## **2\. PLATFORM & SERVICES**

“Platform” means the internet-based property construction, design, consultation, and project management interface operated by Sunbrix, including:

-   Our main website
    
-   Any mobile website or web-app
    
-   Landing pages
    
-   Communication and customer service channels
    
-   Any future mobile application
    

The Platform enables home builders, customers, landowners, and service providers to enquire, engage, interact, and independently contract for residential construction and related services (“Services”).

This Privacy Policy governs how We collect, use, protect, disclose and secure information of all visitors and users of the Platform (“You”, “Your”, “User”).

## **3\. ACCEPTANCE OF THE PRIVACY POLICY**

3.1. **Your use of the Platform implies acceptance.**  
If You do not agree with this Privacy Policy or our Terms of Use, You must immediately discontinue use of the Platform.

3.2. **Use on behalf of an entity.**  
If You use the Platform on behalf of another person or organisation, You confirm You are authorised to provide consent for that entity and that all obligations under this Policy apply to them.

3.3. **Change in law.**  
If data protection laws change, You expressly consent to our continued use, processing and storage of your data to the fullest extent permitted. If additional consent is required, You must provide it to continue accessing the Platform.

## **4\. TYPES OF INFORMATION WE COLLECT**

We collect the following categories of information (“Information”):

### **4.1 User & Account Information**

-   Name
    
-   Phone number
    
-   Email address
    
-   Address
    
-   Identity documents (if voluntarily provided)
    
-   Any files, documents or media uploaded by You
    
-   Communications between You and Us
    
-   Records of enquiries, complaints or requests
    
-   Passwords (encrypted)
    

### **4.2 Demographic Information**

-   Postal code
    
-   City, district and location of the property
    
-   Age group (if provided)
    
-   Language preferences
    

### **4.3 Construction-Related Information / Homebuilder Preferences**

-   Project requirements
    
-   Budget estimates
    
-   Family details related to planning (e.g., number of occupants)
    
-   Site-related documents
    
-   Approval documents voluntarily provided
    
-   Design preferences
    

### **4.4 Financial Information**

Collected only when You engage in a financial transaction or choose financing:

-   Bank account details
    
-   UPI/Payment IDs
    
-   Credit/debit card details
    
-   Financing applications
    
-   Documents required by payment gateways or financial partners
    

**Important:**  
All financial data is **collected and processed by secure, compliant third-party payment gateways or banks**, not directly by Sunbrix.

### **4.5 Behavioural Information**

Automatically collected:

-   IP address
    
-   Browser & OS type
    
-   Type of device
    
-   IMEI / MAC address (if available)
    
-   Pages visited
    
-   Time spent
    
-   Access timestamps
    
-   Location (approximate, non-precise)
    

### **4.6 Indirect Information**

Information about:

-   Contractors, vendors, partners You interact with
    
-   Feedback or ratings You provide
    
-   Communication logs
    

### **4.7 Sensitive Personal Data or Information (SPDI)**

Only if voluntarily provided:

-   Financial credentials
    
-   Health information (rare, only if shared by You)
    
-   Passwords
    
-   Biometric data (Sunbrix does **not** actively collect this)
    

We do **not** request or require SPDI except what You voluntarily provide for service delivery.

## **5\. HOW WE COLLECT INFORMATION**

We collect Information through:

-   Forms filled on the Platform
    
-   Phone calls
    
-   Emails
    
-   Chat systems
    
-   Cookies
    
-   Automated tracking technologies
    
-   Third-party partners (with your consent)
    
-   Documents voluntarily shared
    

We may record phone calls for training, quality, dispute resolution and compliance.

## **6\. HOW WE USE YOUR INFORMATION**

We use the Information for the following purposes (“Purposes”):

-   To provide and manage the Services
    
-   To verify identity & prevent fraud
    
-   To respond to enquiries and communication
    
-   To personalise your experience
    
-   To send critical service-related communications
    
-   To provide design, cost estimates, project progress updates
    
-   To assist with loan or financing applications
    
-   To analyse platform usage and improve Services
    
-   To comply with legal or regulatory requests
    
-   To enforce Terms of Use
    
-   For internal audits, security checks, forensics
    
-   For marketing, only if You have not opted out
    
-   To detect suspicious or illegal activities
    

We may publish User testimonials, reviews, ratings and photos shared voluntarily, and may edit them for clarity without changing intent.

## **7\. SHARING & DISCLOSURE OF INFORMATION**

We may share your Information with:

### **7.1 Contractors & Service Providers**

For:

-   Construction services
    
-   Design services
    
-   Site visits
    
-   Delivery and logistics
    
-   Payment processing
    
-   Loan partners
    
-   Technical service providers
    
-   Cloud storage vendors
    
-   Customer support
    

### **7.2 Legal, Regulatory and Compliance Authorities**

If required by:

-   Law
    
-   Court order
    
-   Government authority
    
-   Enforcement agencies
    

### **7.3 Business Transfers**

If Sunbrix undergoes:

-   Merger
    
-   Acquisition
    
-   Asset sale
    
-   Restructuring
    

Your Information may be transferred to the acquiring entity with the same protections.

### **7.4 Analytics & Marketing Partners**

We share ONLY anonymized or aggregated data, never financial or sensitive personal data.

## **8\. SECURITY PRACTICES**

We follow **Reasonable Security Practices** including:

-   TLS/HTTPS
    
-   Firewalls
    
-   Restricted access to employees on need-to-know basis
    
-   Encryption of sensitive data
    
-   Regular audits
    
-   Secure server & cloud infrastructure
    
-   Compliance with industry standards
    

Despite reasonable protection, no system can guarantee absolute security. You agree to use the Platform at your own risk.

## **9\. RETENTION OF INFORMATION**

We retain Information:

-   Only as long as necessary for the Purpose
    
-   Or as required by law
    
-   Or as required for dispute resolution
    

When no longer needed, data is securely deleted or anonymised.

## **10\. COOKIES & TRACKING TECHNOLOGIES**

We use cookies for:

-   Functionality
    
-   Performance
    
-   Analytics
    
-   Security
    

You may disable cookies, but certain features may not function properly.

## **11\. YOUR RIGHTS**

Subject to applicable law, You may:

-   Access your data
    
-   Correct inaccuracies
    
-   Request deletion
    
-   Withdraw consent
    
-   Opt-out of marketing communications
    
-   Request grievance redressal
    

Requests can be made via email to the grievance officer.

## **12\. OPT-OUT**

You may opt-out of:

-   Marketing calls
    
-   Promotional emails
    
-   Newsletters
    
-   SMS / WhatsApp campaigns
    

However, administrative or essential service messages cannot be opted out of.

## **13\. GRIEVANCE**

In accordance with IT Act & SPDI Rules:

**Name:** Nandish Sridhar  
**Address:** 60, 7th cross, Nanjappa Layout, Arakere, Bannerghatta Road, Bangalore - 560076  
**Email:** sunbrix.co@gmail.com  
**Phone:** +91 8867920940

## **14\. THIRD-PARTY LINKS**

The Platform may contain external links.  
We are **not responsible** for third-party privacy practices or content.

## **15\. DISCLAIMER**

We do not guarantee that Your Information will never be unlawfully accessed by third parties.  
You agree that:

-   You use the Platform at your own risk
    
-   Sunbrix is not liable for external breaches, hacking, or events beyond reasonable control
    
-   You are responsible for maintaining confidentiality of your login credentials
    

## **16\. INDEMNITY**

You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Sunbrix against any claims, damages, liabilities or losses arising from:

-   Information You provided to third parties
    
-   Misuse of Your access
    
-   Violations of this Policy or Terms of Use
    
-   Unauthorized access due to Your negligence
    

## **17\. GOVERNING LAW & DISPUTE RESOLUTION**

This Policy is governed by the laws of India.  
All disputes shall be resolved exclusively in accordance with the dispute resolution process outlined in the **Terms of Use**.

## **18\. SEVERABILITY**

If any provision is held invalid, the remaining provisions shall continue to be enforceable.

## **19\. CHANGES TO THE POLICY**

We may modify this Policy at any time without prior notice.  
Continued use of the Platform constitutes acceptance of the updated Policy.
